^Hey Eric, glad to see you! I'll get your

g-0: ^Guess what...I was offered a position at my company.
^Dude that's awesome-- you worked so hard for it, and there was a lot of competition. Congrats!

c-2: ^Thanks Geogie, that means a lot to me.

g-1: ^I didn't accept the offer. I've been thinking about it all week...but I don't think a boring corporate job is for me. I wanna explore something new.
^Dude! I'm proud of you. That's a hard decision to make, but it's your life. You gotta do what's best for you!

c-4: ^I think so at least! I'm a little nervous though...I hope another opportunity presents itself.
c-5: ^Honestly I'm glad you said that. It feels right, but I know it's not a typical decision.

g-2: ^I know that decision is a little risky, but with the experience the internship gave me I know I can find something.
^It'll be hard but you've got this.
^This city is huge...there's a place for you, I promise.

c-7: ^You're right. I just have to find something that feels right.

g-3: ^Last coffee tastes different...but good! It kinda tastes like fruit.
^You said you didn't know much about coffee, but you've got the flavor notes down!
^That coffee was new, I'm glad you like it.

c-8: ^I guess I just needed to try some better coffee--I owe it to you!
